challenges.name: Broken Object Level Authorization
challenges.description: Access another user's data by manipulating the user ID
hints: Try changing the ID in the URL
What happens if you request /api/users/1 instead of your own ID?

challenges.name: Broken Authentication
hints: Examine the JWT token structure
What algorithm is being used?

challenges.name: Excessive Data Exposure
challenges.description: Find sensitive data in API responses
hints: Look carefully at all fields returned by the API
Is there information you shouldn't see?

challenges.name: Lack of Rate Limiting
hints: Try multiple login attempts
Is there any protection against brute force?

challenges.name: Mass Assignment
challenges.description: Modify unauthorized fields through mass assignment
hints: What fields can you send in the update request?
Try adding fields that weren't in the original form

challenges.name: SQL Injection
hints: Test the search parameter
Try common SQL injection payloads

challenges.name: Command Injection
challenges.description: Execute system commands through the API
hints: Look for endpoints that interact with the system
Can you inject shell commands?

challenges.name: Security Misconfiguration
hints: Check the HTTP response headers
Is CORS properly configured?

challenges.name: Improper Assets Management
challenges.description: Find and exploit old API versions
hints: Are there other API versions available?
Try /api/v1/ instead of /api/v2/

challenges.name: Insufficient Logging
hints: Some actions may not be logged
Check if your attacks leave traces
